rows.label: tlk44310186_04_msg0001
rows.name:
Why, you've come at just the right
time. There happens to be a small
matter we'd like you to attend to...

rows.label: tlk44310186_04_msg0002
rows.name:
Have you perchance any mercenary
friends available for hire?

rows.label: tlk44310186_04_msg0003
rows.name:
My apologies. I haven't been very
clear.

rows.label: tlk44310186_04_msg0004
rows.name:
You see, our good city of Teos Aure
performs military drills with some
frequency.

rows.label: tlk44310186_04_msg0005
rows.name:
We are always striving to hone our
skills. And that got me thinking about
the way you train your mercenaries.

rows.label: tlk44310186_04_msg0006
rows.name:
I think perhaps a collaborative drill,
combining our two forces, would be an
excellent way to measure ourselves up.

rows.label: tlk44310186_04_msg0007
rows.name:
What do you think? Would any of your
mercenary friends be interested in the
idea, do you think?

rows.label: tlk44310186_04_msg0008
rows.name:
You'll introduce me? Splendid,
splendid! I am pleased to hear it!

rows.label: tlk44310186_04_msg0009
rows.name:
I expect with your help, the
Luxurian army shall climb to
ever greater heights!
